echo:FlightCore.NAME: Flight Core
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you lose HP each combat, gain #b2 #yecho:Flight.

echo:OverloadedCore.NAME: Overloaded Core

echo:HolographicTop.NAME: Holographic Top

echo:MetalFork.NAME: Metal Fork
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] whenever an enemy goes below #b50% HP.
